item.title: Use Flipbooks to Explain Your Code and Thought Process
item.description: Learning Râ€™s %>% Using the pipe operator (%>%) is one of my favorite things about coding in R and the tidyverse. However when it was first shown to me, I couldnâ€™t understand what the #rstats nut describing it was so enthusiastic about.
